name: HomeWizardCleaner
0:
”Alexa, turn on cleaner”
”Alexa, turn off cleaner”
”Alexa, turn off vacuum cleaner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control the HomeWizard Cleaner with Alexa.

-- Detailed Description:
Your HomeWizard Cleaner can now connect to your Amazon Echo family of devices through the Alexa connected home. After a few easy setup steps, you can control your HomeWizard Cleaner with Alexa.

Once you know the name of you HomeWizard Cleaner, you can say the following:

HomeWizard Cleaner.
'Alexa, turn on cleaner' - Makes the HomeWizard Cleaner start cleaning.
'Alexa, turn off cleaner' - Makes the HomeWizard Cleaner go back to its dock.

Make sure you already have the HomeWizard Cleaner App installed on your phone and the HomeWizard Cleaner configured correctly.

 Then follow these steps:
1. Next, discover the connected devices on the HomeWizard Cleaner by saying "Alexa, Discover Devices" or by clicking the Discover Devices button in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.
2. Your devices should appear in your list of discovered devices using the name given in the HomeWizard Cleaner App.
3. Now all setup is finished, test it by simply asking Alexa to turn the cleaner on or off.
